mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.siji_id as sijiId ,a.daijia_dingdan_chat_issue_text as daijiaDingdanChatIssueText ,a.issue_time as issueTime ,a.daijia_dingdan_chat_reply_text as daijiaDingdanChatReplyText ,a.reply_time as replyTime ,a.zhuangtai_types as zhuangtaiTypes ,a.daijia_dingdan_chat_types as daijiaDingdanChatTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,siji.siji_uuid_number as sijiUuidNumber ,siji.siji_name as sijiName ,siji.siji_phone as sijiPhone ,siji.siji_id_number as sijiIdNumber ,siji.siji_photo as sijiPhoto ,siji.siji_email as sijiEmail ,siji.new_money as newMoney ,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney
FROM daijia_dingdan_chat a left JOIN siji siji ON a.siji_id = siji.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.siji_id = #{params.sijiId} )
and a.daijia_dingdan_chat_issue_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.daijiaDingdanChatIssueText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.issue_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.issueTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.issue_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.issueTimeEnd})
and a.daijia_dingdan_chat_reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.daijiaDingdanChatReplyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.reply_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.replyTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.reply_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.replyTimeEnd})
and a.zhuangtai_types = #{params.zhuangtaiTypes}
and a.daijia_dingdan_chat_types = #{params.daijiaDingdanChatTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.siji_id IS NOT NULL
and siji.siji_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiUuidNumber},'%')
and siji.siji_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiName},'%')
and siji.siji_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiPhone},'%')
and siji.siji_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiIdNumber},'%')
and siji.siji_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.sijiEmail},'%')
and siji.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and siji.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
